intro.text: This practice guides you through breathing reflection, visualization, and integration of your three minds (emotion, reasonable, and wise) to find balance and clarity.

sections.title: Breathing Reflection
sections.instructions: Spend five minutes focusing on your breath. As you breathe, ask yourself: 'What does my Wise Mind say about this situation?' Notice any insights or clarity that arise.
sections.question: What insights arose during your breathing practice?
sections.placeholder: Notice any thoughts, feelings, or insights that came up...

sections.title: Visualization
sections.instructions: Choose a visualization and spend 5 minutes in this peaceful space. Ask your Wise Mind for guidance and listen for what arises.
sections.question: What guidance did you receive?
sections.placeholder: What insights, images, or guidance came to you during the visualization...

sections.title: Reflection & Integration
sections.instructions: Compare your three minds and integrate your insights.
